title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout Build 2002071610021.
OB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row is deleted. However, the second row is also inadvertently removed from the layout.
EB: Press the Delete button. This should delete the first item on the second row, while the second row remains intact.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Press the Delete button.
2. Observe that the first item on the second row is deleted and the second row remains in the layout.
